= Build Instructions =

<ol>
# Download and install iPhone SDK >= 2.1
# Download ffmpeg from svn (replace -r16838 with the revision you want)

{{{
svn checkout svn://svn.ffmpeg.org/ffmpeg/trunk -r16838 ffmpeg
}}}

<li> Use a configure script from the Download section

{{{
patch -p4 -i ffmpeg4iphone-svn-2009-30-01-v0.0.4.patch
./configure-iphone-v0.0.4
}}}
</ol>

= Configuring and compiling other plugins =
Use the configure files at:
http://code.google.com/p/ffmpeg4iphone/issues/detail?id=1&can=1

You can use those ones configure files as a good template for configuring other plugins. The only thing you would usually need to change is the actual ./configure line in the file.
